 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_2']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c79df754f7ec550f7d5bb8c12a90d54</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch reject alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4c79df754f7ec550f7d5bb8c12a90d54</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>setFeedbackReason</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var selectedReasons = [];
    selectedReasons.push(event.payload.item.id);
    api.setState("selectedReason", () => selectedReasons);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df75f17ec550931b11ef87e54757</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setFeedbackReason</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c479df75f17ec550931b11ef87e54757</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Breadcrumbs broker</api_name><description>Used to populate the breadcrumbs component of custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Breadcrumbs broker</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "displayValue",
    "label": "Display value",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Breadcrumb default value"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Breadcrumb default value","comment":""},{"message":"Display value","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var home = gs.getMessage("Home");
	var homeItem = {"label":home,"icon":"home-outline","hideLabel":false};
    var itemValue = input.displayValue || "";
    return [homeItem , {"label":itemValue}];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>8479df75cf7ec55047e72a8475f20c5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Breadcrumbs broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8479df75cf7ec55047e72a8475f20c5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4479df754a7ec550c094fc6ce4c39f57
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>On search </name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {

    const {
        searchContextConfigId,
        searchTerm
    } = event.payload;
    
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route: "search",
        fields: {
            searchContextConfigId
        },
        params: {
            searchTerm
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>4479df754a7ec550c094fc6ce4c39f57</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>On search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4479df754a7ec550c094fc6ce4c39f57</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df75147ec550a9c16d32b917255d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Task state update transform</api_name><description>Custom portal - Task state update transform</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Task state update transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "sysId",
    "label": "SysId of the task",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
{
    "name": "state",
    "label": "state of the task",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"SysId of the task","comment":""},{"message":"state of the task","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var sys = input.sysId;
	var state = input.state;
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
    gr.get(sys);
    gr.setValue('state', state);
    gr.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df75147ec550a9c16d32b917255d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task state update transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df75147ec550a9c16d32b917255d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0c79df752d7ec550009b94c250943a56
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4c79df75767ec550b49692c760934f56</macroponent><name>Refresh submitted screen</name><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Reference Number : ",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId,
        number
    } = api.context.props;
    if(table !== "sc_request"){
        api.setState("successNumber",number);
        api.setState("successSysId",sysId);
    }else{
        api.setState("requestSysId",sysId);
    }
    let referenceLabl = await helpers.translate('Reference Number : ');
    api.setState("referenceLabel",referenceLabl);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>0c79df752d7ec550009b94c250943a56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh submitted screen</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0c79df752d7ec550009b94c250943a56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(request)">c479df75277ec550e371115ea128b559</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>8879df75747ec550c3d36b44241d4456</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8879df75747ec550c3d36b44241d4456</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0879df75b27ec550f04bfb7ea9d8705c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Heading for record page</api_name><description>Heading for record page (Request) on custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Heading for record page</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[ {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "lookup record broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "table",
    "label": "Table",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Table","comment":""},{"message":"lookup record broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input){
	var table = input.table;
	var modelData = input.catBroker;
	
	var shortDescription = modelData.short_description && modelData.short_description.displayValue;
	var catalogItem = modelData.cat_item && modelData.cat_item.displayValue;
	
	if(table == "sc_req_item"){
			return {
			"title": catalogItem,
			"subtitle": shortDescription
		};
	}else{
		return {
			"title": shortDescription,
			"subtitle": catalogItem
		};
	}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0479df75af7ec55009f0b55635804255
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>Search result clicked</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const ACTION_NAME = event.payload.action.actionDispatch;
    var route = 'landing';
    if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE' || ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE') {
        route = "article";
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION' && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url !== "") {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION') {
        var table = event.payload.action.actionPayload.table;
        if (table == "kb_knowledge") {
            route = "article";
        } else if (table == "sc_cat_item" && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url == "") {
            route = "catalog";
        }
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_EXTERNAL') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else return;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>0479df75af7ec55009f0b55635804255</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Search result clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0479df75af7ec55009f0b55635804255</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8079df75827ec550b1d8097c57fc3956
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">cc79df75407ec5501368f83dce92095a</macroponent><name>Related item page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;

    if (state.relatedItemSysId) {
        api.setState("relatedItemSysId", "");
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route: "catalog",
            fields: {
                "sysId": data.look_up_record_1.result.related_sc_cat_item.value
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df75827ec550b1d8097c57fc3956</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Related item page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8079df75827ec550b1d8097c57fc3956</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_cc79df75137ec550ead948396671e756
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Settings Page">8c79df75597ec550202341fa4f6a1d59</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc79df75137ec550ead948396671e756</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cc79df75137ec550ead948396671e756</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_composite_8879df75fd7ec550ad5b03f3adf9b251
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_composite"><sys_ux_data_broker_composite action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</api_name><data_drivers>{
  "compositeQueryMeta": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "83b97b30773300108d070d74c81061f7",
      "type" : "GRAPHQL"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeQueryMeta",
    "inputValues" : {
      "evamDefinitionId" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "evamDefinitionId"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Metadata defining the EVAM Definition"
  },
  "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding": {
    "definition" : {
        "id" : "8c79df75297ec5506ce9e25bdb03ca5d",
        "type" : "TRANSFORM"
      },
      "elementId" : "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding",
      "inputValues" : {
        "graphqlData" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "compositeQueryMeta",
              "output"
            ]
          }
        },
        "catalogSysId": {
            "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
            "binding": {
              "address": [
                "catalogSysId"
              ]
            }
        }
      },
      "elementLabel" : "Composite Data as View objects"      
  },
  "compositeDataEntities": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "eaafa603773300108d070d74c81061b6",
      "type" : "GRAPHQL"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeDataEntities",
    "inputValues" : {
      "evamMetadata" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding",
            "output"
          ]
        }
      },
      "pageNumber" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageNumber"
            ]
          }
      },
      "pageSize" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageSize"
            ]
          }
      },
      "pageCursor" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageCursor"
            ]
          }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Collated records from EVAM Definition"
  },
  "compositeDataViews": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "7b652701773300108d070d74c81061b8",
      "type" : "TRANSFORM"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeDataViews",
    "inputValues" : {
      "graphqlData" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "compositeDataEntities",
            "output"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Composite Data as View objects"
  }
}</data_drivers><description>This databroker is similar to "EVAM Data Resource" with an additional capability of dynamic catalogId parmeter binding support. This is a temporary workaround for Quebec (only for related catalog items usecase) and eventually will go away when EVAM supports more generic dynamic paramters binding (to support all usecases) in future release.</description><name>EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</name><operations/><output_properties>[
 {
    "name": "compositeDataViews",
    "label": "Composite Data",
    "description": "Stream of data objects from composite sources",
    "origin": {
       "type": "data",
       "id": "compositeDataViews"
    }
  }
]</output_properties><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "evamDefinitionId",
  "label": "EVAM Definition",
  "description": "EVAM definition",
"readOnly": false,
"fieldType": "reference",
  "mandatory": true,
  "typeMetadata": {
      "reference": "sys_ux_composite_data"
    }
},
{
    "name": "catalogSysId",
    "label": "Catalog Sys Id",
    "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related catalogs for",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "string",
    "mandatory": true,
    "defaultValue": ""
},
{
  "name": "pageCursor",
  "label": "Page Cursor",
  "description": "Page cursor for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
},
{
  "name": "pageSize",
  "label": "Page Size",
  "description": "Page size for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "20"
},
{
  "name": "pageNumber",
  "label": "Page Number",
  "description": "Page number for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "0"
}
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_composite</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>8879df75fd7ec550ad5b03f3adf9b251</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_composite_8879df75fd7ec550ad5b03f3adf9b251</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_composite></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Show Submit Comment Alert</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "submitCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: "Comment posted.",
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>4479df75357ec5509ef5317dbaea6456</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Submit Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4479df75357ec5509ef5317dbaea6456</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c079df756b7ec5502494367c5954e856
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Task rejected">0479df75bc7ec55032e5bf15da358e56</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4c79df75cc7ec55087247a2ebfe8c55d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Data row evam broker - Updated articles</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - Updated articles</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.broker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.broker.items[i].propValues;
		if(model.model.rating != ""){
			model.detailValueTwo = gs.getMessage("{0} out of 5", model.detailValueTwo);
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c79df75cc7ec55087247a2ebfe8c55d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - Updated articles</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4c79df75cc7ec55087247a2ebfe8c55d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Task Approved">8c79df75167ec550d076b472ea4a7055</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>0c79df75167ec550eb8861ed9f1fd755</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0c79df75167ec550eb8861ed9f1fd755</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8879df75237ec55022ac4081fbd04a55
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4c79df75767ec550b49692c760934f56</macroponent><name>View request redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId
    } = api.context.props;

    const route = "record_request";

    if (table != "sc_request") {
        table = table == "incident" ? "incident" : "task";
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table : "sc_req_item",
                sysId : api.data.request_item_data_broker_1.output.sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>8879df75237ec55022ac4081fbd04a55</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>View request redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8879df75237ec55022ac4081fbd04a55</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0479df75b17ec5502dd2c2addb96e25e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Request Item Data Broker</api_name><description>Data broker that returns the request itemfrom the request</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Request Item Data Broker</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "sysId",
    "label": "Sys Id",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Sys Id of sc_request table"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Sys Id of sc_request table","comment":""},{"message":"Sys Id","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var requestSysId = input.sysId || "";
    if (requestSysId !== "") {
        var request = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
        request.addQuery('request', requestSysId);
        request.query();
        if (request.next()) {
            return {
				"table" : "sc_req_item",
				"sysId" : request.getUniqueValue(),
				"number" : request.getValue("number")
			};
        }
    }
    return;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>0479df75b17ec5502dd2c2addb96e25e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request Item Data Broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0479df75b17ec5502dd2c2addb96e25e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(task)">c479df75357ec550cd699575456e045a</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>0479df75367ec55039200481673ece57</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0479df75367ec55039200481673ece57</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>handle_tab_filter_click</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: event.payload.selectedFilter,
			facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		},
		false,
    false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df755a7ec550f0b91da1fc464355</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_tab_filter_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8079df755a7ec550f0b91da1fc464355</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c879df75d27ec550e3a9690d4bf3ff56
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>My task page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    let table = "";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.value;
        let tableDisplayValue = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.displayValue;
        let tableStartsWith = tableDisplayValue.substring(0, 3);

        if (tableStartsWith == "INC") {
            table = "incident";
        }else if (tableStartsWith == "RIT") {
            table = "sc_req_item";
        } else {
            table = "task";
        }

        if (state.taskcard && sysId) {
            api.setState("taskcard", "");
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "rec_task",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId,
                    approvalId: api.state.taskcard
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>c879df75d27ec550e3a9690d4bf3ff56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My task page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c879df75d27ec550e3a9690d4bf3ff56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c479df75c37ec550320ce41e2cb58b5d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Data row evam broker - My Requests</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - My Requests</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]
</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		var currDate = new GlideDate();
		var dueDate = new GlideDate();
		var price = model.model.price;
		dueDate.setValue(model.model.due_date);
		if(model.model.table == "sc_req_item"){
			if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Completion date: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
				}
			}
			if(model.model.recurring_frequency != null)
				model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
			if(price.substring(1) == "0.00" && model.model.recurring_frequency == null )
				model.subtitle = " ";
		}
		else{
			if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Completion date: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df75c37ec550320ce41e2cb58b5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - My Requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c479df75c37ec550320ce41e2cb58b5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Data row evam broker - My Requests

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>Request page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    const table = "task";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_2.result.task.value;
        if (state.producedRecordSysId && sysId) {
            api.setState("producedRecordSysId","");  
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "record_request",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df75857ec5502d6b9555942a0756</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c479df75857ec5502d6b9555942a0756</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8479df751a7ec55066ed7762b6697c5c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Display value block transform</api_name><description>This is used to transform the server fetched data into label value pairs to be displayed by the 'display value block' component</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Display value block transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "table",
    "label": "Table",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "user",
    "label": "Logged in user",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "requested",
    "label": "Requested For",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Table","comment":""},{"message":"Requested For","comment":""},{"message":"Logged in user","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var modelArray = [];
    var modelData = input.catBroker;
    var table = input.table;
    var user = input.user;
    var requestedFor = input.requested;
    function block(label, type, value) {
        var out = {};
		var labelNew = gs.getMessage("{0}", label);
		out.label = labelNew;
		var outval = {};
		outval.type = type;
		outval.value = value;
		out.value = outval;
		return out;
	}
    function getDate(item) {
        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {
            var itemDate = new GlideDate();
            itemDate.setValue(item.displayValue);
			item.displayValue = itemDate.getValue();
            return item;
        }
    }
    function addToModel(item, label) {
        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {
            modelArray.push(block(label, "string", item.displayValue));
        }
    }
    if (table === 'sc_req_item') {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(modelData.stage, "Stage");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        if (requestedFor != undefined && requestedFor != null && requestedFor != user) {
            modelArray.push(block("Requested for", "string", requestedFor));
        }
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
        addToModel(modelData.quantity, "Quantity");
        addToModel(modelData.price, "Price");
        var recurringPrice = modelData.recurring_price || {};
        if (recurringPrice.displayValue && recurringPrice.displayValue.substring(1) !== "0.00") {
            modelArray.push(block("Recurring price", "string", recurringPrice.displayValue));
        }
        addToModel(modelData.recurring_frequency, "Recurring frequency");
    } else if (table === 'incident') {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
        addToModel(modelData.caller_id, "Caller");
        addToModel(modelData.urgency, "Urgency");
        addToModel(modelData.cmdb_ci, "Configuration item");
        addToModel(modelData.assigned_to, "Assigned to");
    } else {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
    }

	addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_created_on), "Creation date");
    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_updated_on), "Last update");
    return modelArray;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>8479df751a7ec55066ed7762b6697c5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display value block transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8479df751a7ec55066ed7762b6697c5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Image for record header</api_name><description>Used to fetch the image from a cat item to a record header</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Image for record header</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var model = {};
    var modelData = input.catBroker.picture.displayValue;
    if(modelData != undefined){
		model.headerImage = modelData;
		model.fieldLabel = "Test value"; //Here only to support the required structure of the object
	}
    return model;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>0479df75807ec550758156844b39165d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Image for record header</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0479df75807ec550758156844b39165d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.StringUtils</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>StringUtils</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "string",
  "label": "String",
  "description": "",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": true,
  "defaultValue": ""
},{
  "name": "prepend",
  "label": "Prepend",
  "description": "",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
},{
  "name": "append",
  "label": "Append",

  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
}
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var prepend = input.prepend || '';

    return prepend + string + append;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc79df75de7ec55045aab84dd578735d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>StringUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_cc79df75de7ec55045aab84dd578735d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">cc79df75407ec5501368f83dce92095a</macroponent><name>Order success redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        payload: params
    } = event;
    const route = "order_success";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>0079df75be7ec5505d84071175f7d856</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Order success redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0079df75be7ec5505d84071175f7d856</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>Launch approve alert </name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
       const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_1']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df75347ec5504c375bae40e26f57</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch approve alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8079df75347ec5504c375bae40e26f57</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c879df75887ec5504a9108ef4fe09757
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>Card click redirection for My requests</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;

    const table = event.payload.table;
    const sysId = event.payload.sysId;
    const route = "record_request";

    if (table === "sc_req_item") {
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else if(table == "incident"){
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "incident",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
    else{
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "task",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>c879df75887ec5504a9108ef4fe09757</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Card click redirection for My requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c879df75887ec5504a9108ef4fe09757</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8c79df75c77ec550a2ca75a3bc84d35b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Boolean reversal transform</api_name><description>Required because the buttons prop is true to disable and false to enable, and also to fetch the Custom portal settings page text</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Boolean reversal transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "GraphQL Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"GraphQL Broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelData = input.broker.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_properties._results[0].value.value;
	var mfa = {};
	if(modelData == "false"){
		mfa.value = "true";
		mfa.text = gs.getMessage("Please enable Multi-factor authentication on the instance.");
	}
	else{
		mfa.value = "false";
		mfa.text = gs.getMessage("Configure Multi-factor authentication by clicking the button below");
	}
	return mfa;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c79df75c77ec550a2ca75a3bc84d35b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Boolean reversal transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8c79df75c77ec550a2ca75a3bc84d35b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4879df753a7ec55026270a123fef5756
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Create knowledge feedback</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        context,
        data,
        state,
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;
    const {
        modal
    } = helpers;
    const insertRecord = function(table, fields, type) {
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", type);
        data.create_record_1.execute({
            table,
            templateFields: fields,
            useSetDisplayValue: ''
        });
    };
    var articleSysId = context.props.sysId;
    var templateFields = "article=" + articleSysId + "^";
    var articleData = data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails;
    var yesMessage = "Thank you for your feedback";
    var noMessage = "We'll improve the article based on your feedback.";
    const feedbackAction = state.currentFeedbackAction;

    if (event.elementId == "kb_star_rating") {
        setState('currentFeedbackAction', "rating");
        templateFields += "rating=" + event.payload.rating;
        if (articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForRating >= event.payload.rating) {
            setState('userRating', event.payload.rating);
            modal.open("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        } else {
            insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "rating");
        }
    }

    if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no") {
        var showModal = (articleData.showFeedbackOptions || articleData.showFeedbackComments) && articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForHelpful;
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", "boolean_feedback");
        if (showModal) {
            setState('additionalDetails', null);
            setState("selectedReason", ["4"]);
            modal.open("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        } else {
            templateFields += "useful=no";
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "boolean_feedback");
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_yes") {
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", "boolean_feedback");
        templateFields += "useful=yes";
        setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', yesMessage);
        setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-up-outline');
        setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "boolean_feedback");
        const usefulYesCount = articleData.usefulYesCount+1;
        const totalUsefulCount = articleData.totalUsefulCount+1;
        var helpPercent = (usefulYesCount && totalUsefulCount) ? 
            Math.round(usefulYesCount / totalUsefulCount *100) : 0;
        const helpPercentMessage = (helpPercent) ? helpPercent+'% found this helpful':'';
        setState('helpPercentMessage',helpPercentMessage);
        setState('isHelpPercentInfoHidden', false);
    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no_ignore") {

        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        if (feedbackAction != "rating") {
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            templateFields += "reason=4^useful=no";
        }
        if (feedbackAction == "rating") {
            templateFields += "reason=4^rating=" + state.userRating;
        }
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields,feedbackAction);

    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no_submit") {
        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        if ((state.selectedReason)[0] != null)
            templateFields += "reason=" + (state.selectedReason)[0] + "^";
        if (state.additionalDetails != null)
            templateFields += "comments=" + state.additionalDetails + "^";
        if (feedbackAction != "rating") {
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            templateFields += "useful=no";
        }
        if (feedbackAction == "rating") {
            templateFields += "rating=" + state.userRating;
        }
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields,feedbackAction);
    } else if (event.elementId == "flag_article") {
        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_2']");
        var comments = state.flagArticleContent.replaceAll("\n", "\\n").replaceAll("^", "^");
        templateFields += "flagged=true^comments=" + comments;
        setState('flagArticleContent', comments);
        if (articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForFlag)
            templateFields += "^reason=Flagged";
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "flag_article");
    }

    if (event.elementId == "create_record_1") {
        var items = [];
        var requestFailed = false;
		
        if (event.name == "DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED") {
            var output = event.payload.data.output.data.GlideRecord_Mutation.insert_kb_feedback;
            if (output == null) {
                requestFailed = true;
            } else {
                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "flag_article") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "flagArticleSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Article has been flagged",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }
                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "rating") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "ratingArticleSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Feedback submitted.",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }

                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "boolean_feedback") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "booleanFeedbackSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Feedback submitted.",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }
            }
        }
        
        if (event.name == "DATA_OP_FAILED" || requestFailed) {
            items.push({
                id: "flagArticleFailure",
                status: "critical",
                icon: "info-circle-outline",
                content: "You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.",
                action: {
                    type: "dismiss"
                }
            });
        }
        if (items.length > 0) {
            emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                items
            });
        }
        setState('currentFeedbackAction', "");
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>4879df753a7ec55026270a123fef5756</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create knowledge feedback</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4879df753a7ec55026270a123fef5756</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c479df750b7ec55082a25211a15ff055
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Toggle Comment Reaction</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, imports }) {
  var likeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "like_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  var unlikeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "unlike_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  if (event.payload.reaction) {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", likeCommentPayload);
  } else {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", unlikeCommentPayload);
  }
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df750b7ec55082a25211a15ff055</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggle Comment Reaction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c479df750b7ec55082a25211a15ff055</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_composite_data_template"><sys_ux_composite_data_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><name>Popular articles template</name><sys_class_name>sys_ux_composite_data_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>8479df75397ec550417d9f79d94d4d52</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Popular articles template</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_composite_data_template_8479df75397ec550417d9f79d94d4d52</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><template>{
	"component": "now-card-evam-content",
    "staticValues": {
		"detailLabelOne": {
            "translatable": true,
            "key": "Views"
        },

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df75a07ec550348e4585177bae5c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Data row evam broker - My Tasks</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - My Tasks</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]
</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		var currDate = new GlideDate();
		var dueDate = new GlideDate();
		dueDate.setValue(model.model.due_date);
		if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Approval due: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
					model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Approval overdue: {0}", dueDate);
				}
		}
		model.title = gs.getMessage("Approval Request: {0}", model.title);
		if(model.model.table == "sc_req_item"){
			if(model.model.recurring_frequency != null){
				model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
			}
		}
    if(model.model.sys_created_on != null){
			var createdDate = new GlideDate();
			createdDate.setValue(model.model.sys_created_on);
			model.detailValueOne = createdDate.toString();
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df75a07ec550348e4585177bae5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - My Tasks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df75a07ec550348e4585177bae5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Data row evam broker - My Tasks
