sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4079df75d67ec5508b1eb1c2dd41d156
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Update comments</name><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Comment deleted.",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Comment posted.",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let done = false;
    let itemPath = [];

    const getPath = (items, pid, level) => {
        for (let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
            if (!done) {
                itemPath.length = level;

                if (items[i].id == pid) {
                    itemPath.push(i);
                    done = true;
                    return;
                } else {
                    if (items[i].children && items[i].children.length > 0) {
                        itemPath.push(i);
                        getPath(items[i].children, pid, level + 1);
                    }
                }
            } else return;
        }
    };

    const getStringPath = (path, key) => {
        let actualPath = "";

        for (let i = 0; i < path.length - 1; i++) {
            actualPath += `[${path[i]}].children`;
        }

        if (path.length != 0 && key)
            actualPath += `[${path[path.length - 1]}].${key}`;
        else if (path.length != 0)
            actualPath += `[${path[path.length - 1]}]`;

        return actualPath;
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.get()
     */
    const get = (obj, path) => {
        if (!path)
            return undefined;

        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        return (
            pathArray.reduce((prevObj, key) => prevObj && prevObj[key], obj)
        );
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.set()
     */
    const set = (obj, path, value) => {
        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        pathArray.reduce((acc, key, i) => {
            if (acc[key] === undefined) acc[key] = {};
            if (i === pathArray.length - 1) acc[key] = value;
            return acc[key];
        }, obj);
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.unset()
     */
    const unset = (obj, path) => {
        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        pathArray.reduce((acc, key, i) => {
            if (i === pathArray.length - 1) {
                acc.splice(key, 1);
            }
            return acc[key];
        }, obj);
    };

    const put = function(obj, path, val) {
        var stringToPath = function(path) {
            if (typeof path !== 'string')
                return path;

            var output = [];

            path.split('.').forEach(function(item, index) {
                item.split(/\[([^}]+)\]/g).forEach(function(key) {
                    if (key.length > 0) {
                        output.push(key);
                    }
                });
            });

            return output;
        };

        path = stringToPath(path);

        var length = path.length;
        var current = obj;

        path.forEach(function(key, index) {
            if (index === length - 1) {
                current[key].unshift(val);
            } else {
                if (!current[key]) {
                    current[key] = {};
                }

                current = current[key];
            }
        });
    };

    if (event.elementId == 'get_article_details_1' && event.name == 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED') {
        if (api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails.showFeedbackComments) {
            api.setState('articleId', api.context.props.sysId);
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'retrieve_knowledge_comments' && event.name == 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.data.retrieve_knowledge_comments.knowledgeComments;

        if (comments) {
            api.setState('comments', comments);
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'insert_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let data = JSON.parse(event.payload.data.output.data.AppKnowledge_Mutation.addComment);

        if (data.sys_id) {
            helpers.translate('Comment posted.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "submitCommentAlert",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });

            let comment = {
                'id': data.sys_id,
                'parent': data.parent,
                'children': data.children,
                'created': data.created_on,
                'text': data.comment_text,
                'user': {
                    'name': data.user.name,
                    'id': data.user.sys_id,
                    'avatar': data.user.avatar
                },
                'reactionCount': 0,
                'isReacted': false
            };

            let comments = api.state.comments;

            if (comment.parent) {
                getPath(comments, comment.parent, 0);

                if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                    api.setState('comments', []);

                    put(comments, getStringPath(itemPath, 'children'), comment);

                    api.setState('comments', comments);
                    done = false;
                    itemPath = [];
                }
            } else {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                comments.unshift(comment);
                api.setState('comments', comments);
            }
        } else {
            helpers.translate('You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "commentLimitAlert",
                        status: "critical",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'delete_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);
            
            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let index = itemPath[0];

                if (itemPath.length <= 1) {
                    comments.splice(index, 1);
                } else {
                    unset(comments, getStringPath(itemPath, null));
                }

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }

            helpers.translate('Comment deleted.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "deleteCommentAlert",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'like_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);

            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let path = getStringPath(itemPath, "");
                let reactionCount = get(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`);

                set(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`, reactionCount + 1);
                set(comments, `${path}.isReacted`, true);

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'unlike_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);

            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let path = getStringPath(itemPath, "");
                let reactionCount = get(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`);

                set(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`, reactionCount - 1);
                set(comments, `${path}.isReacted`, false);

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>4079df75d67ec5508b1eb1c2dd41d156</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update comments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4079df75d67ec5508b1eb1c2dd41d156</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8c79df75d47ec55099205167498a7954
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4c79df75767ec550b49692c760934f56</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c79df75d47ec55099205167498a7954</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8c79df75d47ec55099205167498a7954</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4879df75677ec5504ef76935d425525d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Catalog item variables transform</api_name><description>Used to convert the catalog item variables in label/value pairs</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Catalog item variables transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
        "name": "sysId",
        "label": "Catalog Sys Id",
        "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related variables for",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "string",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related variables for","comment":""},{"message":"Catalog Sys Id","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelArray = [];
    var modelData = input.catBroker.data.GlideRecord_Query.sc_req_item;
	function block(label,type,value){
		var out = {};
		out.label = label;
		var outval = {};
		outval.type = type;
		outval.value = value;
		out.value = outval;
		return out;
	}
	for(var i = 0; i < modelData._results.length; i++){
		if(modelData._results[i].sys_id.value == input.sysId){
			var modelVariableArray = modelData._results[i].variables;
			for(var x = 0; x < modelVariableArray.variables.length; x++){
				var name =  modelVariableArray.variables[x].variableLabel;
				modelArray.push(block(name, "string", modelVariableArray.variables[x].variableDisplayValue));
			}
		}
	}
	if(modelArray.length > 0)
		return modelArray;
	else{
		var emptylabel = gs.getMessage("No additional details at this time.");
		var emptyvalue = "";
		modelArray.push(block(emptylabel, "string", emptyvalue));
		return modelArray;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>4879df75677ec5504ef76935d425525d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Catalog item variables transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4879df75677ec5504ef76935d425525d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>handle_search</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
    const fields = {
        searchContextConfigId: api.context.props.searchContextConfigId
    };
    const params = {
        searchFilters: api.context.props.searchFilters
    };
    
	if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_RESULTS_CONTAINER#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = true;
        
  	} else if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_COMBOBOX#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = false;
        console.log("search clicked");
        api.setState('loading', true);
        api.setState('searchTerm', event.payload.searchTerm);
  	}
	//helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c79df75707ec5506abdf440561c1b55</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4c79df75707ec5506abdf440561c1b55</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8c79df75297ec5506ce9e25bdb03ca5d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Transform metadata to add catalog filter</api_name><description>This is an interim way to add dynamic catalog filter before Related catalogs EVAM usecase </description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Transform metadata to add catalog filter</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
    {
        "name": "graphqlData",
        "label": "GraphQL Metadata Response",
        "description": "",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "object",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    },
    {
        "name": "catalogSysId",
        "label": "Catalog Sys Id",
        "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related catalogs for",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "string",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {

	var compositeMetadata = input
		.graphqlData
		.data
		.GlideCompositeDataMetadata_Query
		.getMetadata;
	var END_QUERY = '^EQ';
	var AND = '^';
	compositeMetadata.datasources.map(function(source) {
		if (source.table === 'sc_2_sc') {
			var catalogFilter = 'sc_cat_item=' + input.catalogSysId + END_QUERY;
			source.query = source.query? new String(source.query).replace(END_QUERY, "") + AND + catalogFilter : catalogFilter;
		}
	});
	
	return compositeMetadata;

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c079df75ef7ec550a4f9b8c44e897357
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>handle_pagination</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
	const props = api.context.props;
	const fields = {
		searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId,
		searchTerm: props.searchTerm
	};
	const token = event.payload.paginationToken;
	const params = {
		searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
		facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
		disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck,
		paginationToken: token
	};
	global.window.scrollTo(0, 0);
	helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>c079df75ef7ec550a4f9b8c44e897357</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_pagination</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c079df75ef7ec550a4f9b8c44e897357</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df753f7ec550d8bcdbb50a489b5e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Get approver sysId</api_name><description>Used to fetch sysId from sysapproval_approver table for relevant task record</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Get approver sysId</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "number",
    "label": "Number on record",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "user",
    "label": "SysID of the logged in user",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
   }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input){
	try{
		var user_id = input.user;
		var record_id = input.number;
		var target = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
		target.addQuery("sysapproval",record_id);
		target.addQuery("approver", user_id);
		target.query(); 
		if (target.next()) { 
			return target.getUniqueValue();
		}
	}catch(e){}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df753f7ec550d8bcdbb50a489b5e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get approver sysId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df753f7ec550d8bcdbb50a489b5e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8c79df75c87ec550f9d66687af139f56
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>Refresh landing</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if(event.payload.name !== 'refresh'){
        return;
    }
    api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    api.data.evam_myrequests.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_1.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_2.refresh();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c79df75c87ec550f9d66687af139f56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh landing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8c79df75c87ec550f9d66687af139f56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4079df75f67ec55050d5f1f437db8f5d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Content set - Related items list</api_name><description>Used to convert the evam data to required content set format in the related items section of the catalog page of custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Content set - Related items list</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		if(model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"] != null)
			model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " with " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_price"] + " " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"];
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4079df75f67ec55050d5f1f437db8f5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Content set - Related items list</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4079df75f67ec55050d5f1f437db8f5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>

    api
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "deleteCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: "Comment deleted.",
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>8479df75bb7ec5503710c36641471956</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Delete Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8479df75bb7ec5503710c36641471956</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>handle_facet_click</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
			facetFilters: event.payload.selectedFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		});
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc79df75a47ec55066bde40263e9b055</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_facet_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cc79df75a47ec55066bde40263e9b055</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_graphql_c879df75277ec5503d8405884dbe7851
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_graphql"><sys_ux_data_broker_graphql action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Fetch catalog item variables</api_name><description>Used to fetch the 'variables' of a particular catalog item</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Fetch catalog item variables</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "sysId",
  "label": "Cat Item id",
  "description": "Get variables for catalog item",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
}
]</props><query>query($sysId: String) {
  GlideRecord_Query {
    sc_req_item(queryConditions: $sysId) {
      _results {
        sys_id {
          value
        }
        variables {
          variables {
            variableLabel
            variableDisplayValue
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}</query><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[(function buildQuery(query, inputs) { 
         var qb = new GraphQLQueryBuilder(query, inputs);
   // return appropriate query here
    return qb; 
   })(query, inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_graphql</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>c879df75277ec5503d8405884dbe7851</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch catalog item variables</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_graphql_c879df75277ec5503d8405884dbe7851</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type>query</type><use_record_domain>false</use_record_domain></sys_ux_data_broker_graphql></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c879df75487ec550638ec57199dedc5c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Hide data rows</api_name><description>This is used to hide the data row with no cards on the custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Hide data rows</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
 {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "EVAM broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelData = input.broker.items;
	if(modelData.length == 0)
		return true;
	else
		return false;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>c879df75487ec550638ec57199dedc5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide data rows</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c879df75487ec550638ec57199dedc5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>
